name: Hellscape (Leon & John, Game Dev)
description:
HELLSCAPE is a game made for the MiniJam54: Memory Game Jam.

Controls

WASD - Movement

E - Interact

Enter - Occassional Interact

Mouse - Place turrets/remove turrets

Enter - Quit, at all costs

Game Made By

Leon: Code

John: Code + Artwork

Harry: Music 

Leon and John have their own Twitter for Game Updates
